PvSerialLib.h
1 // *****************************************************************************
2 //
3 // Copyright (c) 2009, Pleora Technologies Inc., All rights reserved.
4 //
5 // *****************************************************************************
6 //
7 // File Name....: PvSerialLib.h
8 //
9 // *****************************************************************************
10 
11 #ifndef __PVSERIALLIB_H__
12 #define __PVSERIALLIB_H__
13 
14 #ifdef WIN32
15 
16 #ifdef PV_SERIAL_EXPORTS
17 
18  // Define the export symbol
19  #ifndef PT_LIB_STATIC
20  #define PV_SERIAL_API __declspec( dllexport )
21  #else
22  #define PV_SERIAL_API
23  #endif // PT_LIB_STATIC
24 
25 #else // PV_SERIAL_EXPORTS
26 
27  // Define the import symbol
28  #ifndef PT_LIB_STATIC
29  #define PV_SERIAL_API __declspec( dllimport )
30  #else
31  #define PV_SERIAL_API
32  #endif // PT_LIB_STATIC
33 
34  #if defined ( PV_DEBUG )
35  #define _PT_DEBUG_
36  #define PT_DEBUG_ENABLED
37  #endif // PV_DEBUG
38 
39  // Define the suffix used for the static version of the library file
40  #ifdef PT_LIB_STATIC
41  #define PT_SUFFIX_STATIC "s"
42  #else // PT_LIB_STATIC
43  #define PT_SUFFIX_STATIC
44  #endif // PT_LIB_STATIC
45 
46  // Define the suffix used for the debug version of the library file
47  #if defined( _PT_DEBUG_ ) && defined( PT_DEBUG_ENABLED )
48  #define PT_SUFFIX_DEBUG "Dbg"
49  #else // defined( _PT_DEBUG_ ) && defined( PT_DEBUG_ENABLED )
50  #define PT_SUFFIX_DEBUG
51  #endif // defined( _PT_DEBUG_ ) && defined( PT_DEBUG_ENABLED )
52 
53  // Define the suffix used for the 64-bit version of the library file
54  #if defined( _PT_64_ ) || defined( _WIN64 )
55  #define PT_SUFFIX_64 "64"
56  #else
57  #define PT_SUFFIX_64
58  #endif
59 
60  // With debug and/or static, there is an hypen after the library name
61  #if defined( PT_LIB_STATIC ) || ( defined( _PT_DEBUG_ ) && defined( PT_DEBUG_ENABLED ) )
62  #define PT_SUFFIX_HYPHEN "_"
63  #else
64  #define PT_SUFFIX_HYPHEN
65  #endif
66 
67  // Ask the compiler to link the required version of the library
68  #pragma comment( lib, "PvSerial" PT_SUFFIX_64 PT_SUFFIX_HYPHEN PT_SUFFIX_STATIC PT_SUFFIX_DEBUG ".lib" )
69 
70  // Undefined the symbols used to link the required library file
71  #undef PT_SUFFIX_STATIC
72  #undef PT_SUFFIX_DEBUG
73  #undef PT_SUFFIX_64
74  #undef PT_SUFFIX_HYPHEN
75 
76 #endif // PV_SERIAL_EXPORTS
77 
78 #else
79 #define PV_SERIAL_API
80 #endif
81 
82 #endif // __PVSERIALLIB_H__
